string.text: Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
You must meet with one of the Sin group leaders. Go to him now.
Good luck.
Retrieve the Secrets of Lab X-16
Bring the secrets found within Lab X-16 back to Stribog.

As the true keepers of the Zone, we must act fast and keep its secrets hidden away from the eyes of this sinful world. One of the many secrets can be found inside the laboratory known as "X-16". Bring them to me, brother. We will keep them safe.
You have done well.
Escort the Believer
A man is seeking enlightenment. He wants to escape from his squad, kill the other members of the squad and escort him back to the Stribog. The man is carrying SVD rifle.

A man who believes in our cause has reached out to us. He wishes to be freed from this world, but he does not know how to leave his past life behind. You will recognize him by the SVD he's carrying. Kill those he is with. Save the believer. Though, expect him to shoot back while he's still under watch as he must not blow his cover. Soon, he will be enlightened.
Your efforts make us stronger. Well done!
Thank you, brother. I'm truly thankful... Lead the way. It is time to leave this old world behind.
Thank you again. I will go to meet my brothers. Farewell.
Avenge the Sinners
Find the infidel who killed the Sin members, and avenge them.
A handful of our brave fighters have been murdered in cold blood. We can't let the infidel escape. Avenge our brothers.
You have served our cause well.
Limansk Purge
Defeat the enemies inside Limansk.
The time has come, brother. The Monolith elders are seeking our help to purge Limansk and defeat the enemies lurking inside. Make us proud.
You are a fine warrior.
Relinquish Payment to Join Sin
You are to become a Sin member. You will have no more need for money. Give Stribog 1,000 RU to join our cause.

It's good you have come to your senses, my child. We will welcome you into the order of the Zone but you must first relinquish 1,000 RU. Consider it a fee to truly free yourself from your old life and start anew.
Well done. You shall bring light to this restless world from now on.
Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
My son, you serve the Sinners and Monolith well. Speak with one of the elders and ask what you may do to further help our great cause.
Good luck, my son.
Retrieve the Secrets of Lab X-18
Bring the secrets found inside Lab X-18 back to Dazhbog.

As the true keepers of the Zone, we must act fast and keep its secrets hidden away from the eyes of this sinful world. One of the many secrets can be found inside the laboratory known as "X-18". Bring them to me, brother. We will keep them safe.
Splendid work!
Hunt the Forest Beast
Hunt down a beast that attacked Dazhbog's men inside the Red Forest.
This forest can be tough at times, even for our brothers. One of them has been attacked by a dangerous beast. Go out there and hunt it down.
Good job, brother. The forest will be safer.
Slay the Enemy Informer
Kill the infidel for Dazhbog.
One of the infidels has been seen watching our brothers from a distance. The coward ran back to his leaders. He must be slayed at any cost.
Great work. No one will dare approach us again.
Find %s for Dazhbog
Dazhbog requires %s to install basic equipment upgrades.
I need you to do something for me. I need specific tools to tune our weapons.
Okay, I need a %s. Go, now.
You've done well.
Find %s for Dazhbog
Dazhbog requires %s to install advanced equipment upgrades.
I need tools of better quality. Can you find some for me, brother?
I need a set of advanced tools to better serve my bothers. Find me some and bring them to me. Now, go.
Good. You've brought them to me. You serve us well. This will not be forgotten.
Find %s for Dazhbog
Dazhbog requires %s to install expert equipment upgrades.
I need tools that will allow me to modify and create weapons of pure retribution. Serve us again, brother.
I need the best of the best; a set of expert tools. These will be perfect. Get them for me and I'll be sure to make it worth your while.
Good. You've brought them to me as asked. You devotion has not gone unnoticed.
